trans-unit.source: Instead of filter using width and height, we choose pixels. Move the knob of above slider bar or click preview cells to change filter setting.
trans-unit.target: 支持用像素尺寸过滤图片，而非宽高。移动上方的滑块或点击预览单元以调整过滤设置。
trans-unit.note: Class = "NSTextFieldCell"; title = "Instead of filter using width and height, we choose pixels. Move the knob of above slider bar or click preview cells to change filter setting."; ObjectID = "setting-pixels-fliter-tips";

Class = "NSTextFieldCell"; title = "Tag Name"; ObjectID = "tagblack-list-tag"; Note = "🚩NO NEEDS";

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to clear all caches?
trans-unit.target: 确定要清空所有缓存么？

trans-unit.source: Reset will lose all local records, and there is no guarantee that the problem will be fixed.
trans-unit.target: 重置后所有本地记录会丢失，也不能保证一定能正常工作

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to reset database?

It seems that you have used a higher version of this app before, but downgrading is not supported. It is highly recommended to upgrade to the latest version.
Howerver, if you choose continue, you may experience a crash or even data corruption, although it may work normally.
trans-unit.target:
可能你之前在用应用的更高版本，我们不支持应用降级，强烈推荐你升级到最新版本。
如果你选择继续使用，虽然应用可能会正常工作，但也有可能会崩溃甚至导致你的数据损坏。

trans-unit.source: Thanks. I will look at it.
There are some new posts, click to view.
In order to make the content seen in the app safe for all ages, we have built-in filters. They are mandatory, you cannot edit or disable them.
trans-unit.target: 为保证应用内容适合全年龄段，应用内建了强制的标签过滤规则，不可编辑或禁用。

trans-unit.source: You can delete tags by swip left or select one then press delete
trans-unit.target: 提示：左滑或选中后按删除键可删除标签

trans-unit.source: Network connection may have been lost, please try again
trans-unit.target: 网络连接可能已断开，请重试
没有联网，请检查网络连接

trans-unit.source: Send anonymous flag requires you to turn on iCloud for (App().displayName).
trans-unit.target: 发送匿名举报需要你允许 B9ImageBoard 使用 iCloud。
